# Opinary

## Example

```html
<amp-embed
  width="500"
  height="500"
  type="opinary"
  layout="intrinsic"
  data-client="test-success"
>
</amp-embed>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please contact the ad network or refer to their documentation.

### Required parameters

-   `data-client` - the publishers name in the Opinary AMS system
